DOC.brief_summary: The purpose methodology study evaluate effect AZD8309 cell inflammatory biomarkers nasal lavage blood nasal challenge lipopolysaccharide ( LPS )
DOC.brief_title: A Methodology Study Healthy Subjects Evaluate Effect AZD8309 After Nasal Administration Lipopolysaccharide ( LPS )
DOC.criteria: Healthy men healthy , permanently sterilize , woman age 18 50 year inclusive , nonsmoker exsmokers , Body Mass Index 18 30 kg/m2 minimum body weight 50 kg Blood neutrophil count 2.2x10^9/L Clinical relevant disease and/or abnormality
